textBox.richText: Professional publications and associations are important to understanding your field of research, but if you are like me and not going directly from undergraduate to graduate studies, it may be difficult to locate sources. I have put together the following pages to help others be on top of recent debates in world history, teaching, genocide and human rights studies. Links for Discussion Lists Links for Magazines Links for University World History & Genocide Studies Departments I will be adding the Links for Journals & Reviews over the weekend.
